name: opencode-helicone-session
description: Integration plugin for Helicone session tracking and monitoring in OpenCode to analyze LLM API usage, costs, and performance metrics.

installation.summary: Install via npm and configure Helicone API key in OpenCode settings.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install opencode-helicone-session
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["opencode-helicone-session"]
}
```

Configure your Helicone API key in the OpenCode settings.

Restart OpenCode to activate the plugin.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

Once installed and configured, the plugin automatically tracks all OpenCode sessions through Helicone, providing:

- Real-time cost monitoring
- Performance analytics
- Request logging
- Usage patterns analysis

View your analytics at [helicone.ai](https://helicone.ai)
